name: autocaliweb
description: Autocaliweb is a self-hosted meal planning and grocery list web application that helps users plan recipes, schedule meals, and automate shopping lists.
features: Meal Planning: Plan weekly meals with recipe organization. Organized cooking.
Recipe Management: Store and organize your favorite recipes. Digital cookbook.
Grocery Lists: Automatically generate shopping lists from meal plans. Smart shopping.
Shopping Automation: Streamline grocery shopping with auto-generated lists. Save time.
Meal Scheduling: Schedule meals for the week ahead. Plan efficiently.
Recipe Database: Build your personal recipe collection. Never lose recipes.
Self-Hosted: Keep your meal data private. Complete control.
Web Interface: Access from any device with a browser. Plan anywhere.
